text: Hi John, I'm planning this week's schedule for our client John and would like to incorporate some of the coping strategies we discussed. Could you remind me of the key points we covered last time?
Morning John, just checking in to see if there's anything special I should be aware of for our client John's care this week?
Hey John, I noticed our client John seemed a bit off yesterday. Did anything happen during your session with him that I should be aware of?
Good morning, John. I'm updating the care plan for our client John. Do you have any suggestions based on your recent sessions with him?
